text: Pedro Amat Fontanals (born July 13, 1940) is a former Spanish field hockey player. He captured the bronze medal with the Men's National Team at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Spain Category:Field hockey players at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Field hockey players at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Field hockey players at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Olympic medalists in field hockey Category:Medalists at the 1960 Summer Olympics
title: Pedro Amat
